name: Rainbow Beach - Demo
description:
The game:

Color Beach is an adventure puzzle game were the main mechanic is to mix colors using the primary colors on your controller in order to complete tasks. These tasks include destroying enemies, dodging turret bullets, unlocking chests and unlocking bridges in order to progress through the levels.

Story:

Hidden across vast oceans,  communities thrive on their tropical islands. Each island living without conflict through the rule of Queen Ulani as her power, kindness and wisdom have helped them to become the happiest nation that ever existed.

On one seemingly normal night, as the waves of the ocean calmly rolled and the light of the large full moon cast a peaceful white glow over the islands, a large rumble disturbed the earth and an ominous orange glow filled the sky, causing panic among the residents of these beautiful islands. Something was coming…

Gruesome unnatural beings attacked the royal palace in search of the Queen. She fled, travelling by sea to another island to lure the evil out of her village and save her people.

Controls:

Xbox Controller: X, Y, B to mix colours, Left stick to navigate, A to climb

Keyboard: I, O, P to mix colours, WASD to move, L to climb
